body: This is so good. I almost wish it's a part of the anime.

I think the intro fit the characters. Though this does not mean that the overall product is engaging as it is still an scenario deprived of commen sense and realistic relationship dynamics. It looked fairly good, though I felt the pacing was off in the end. Perhaps it would have been more enderring if she tried to subtly ask for something afterwards the same way she did not let him pull out.
